arts.ttl: Chelsea Without ‘Seven or Eight Players’ for Liverpool Clash
arts.sum: A decision on Cole Palmer’s longstanding groin injury will be made this week.

arts.ttl: Alisson, Chiesa, Ekitike: Chelsea learn Liverpool team news as Arne Slot confirms starting goalkeeper
arts.sum: The former's injury looked way more serious, though, so it is hardly a surprise that the goalkeeper will not make Liverpool's travelling squad to West London. Liverpool head coach Arne Slot has ruled goalkeeper Alisson out of Saturday's trip to Chelsea, with two other players doubtful.

arts.ttl: Enzo Maresca confirms Chelsea are without eight players for Liverpool clash
arts.sum: Maresca revealed, “Cole is still out. We have Trev suspended. Seven, eight players out for tomorrow.” Colwill, Delap and Fofana’s returns remain distant.

arts.ttl: 'Lack of trust' - Maresca's problems at Chelsea laid bare ahead of Liverpool
arts.sum: Despite spending heavily again in the summer, glaring issues remain within Enzo Maresca's squad and Chelsea have underwhelmed to start the 2025/26 campaign as a result.

arts.ttl: Arne Slot delivers Alexander Isak reality check ahead of Liverpool vs Chelsea
arts.sum: Alexander Isak has been handled carefully since his blockbuster transfer to Liverpool and Arne Slot has explained why it will still be some time before fans see the best of him

arts.ttl: Liverpool handed major fitness boost ahead of Chelsea clash with key player available after he 'felt something' in Champions League loss at Galatasaray
arts.sum: Liverpool may have a growing list of injury concerns, but Arne Slot's worries have been eased with the news that one of his key players is available for action.

arts.ttl: ‘I'm going’: Theo Walcott gives his score prediction for Chelsea vs Liverpool on Saturday
arts.sum: Following consecutive defeats, Arne Slot’s Liverpool side will now face Chelsea at Stamford Bridge in the Premier League. Liverpool are still top of the table...

arts.sum: Team form, absentees and our predicted XIs The post Chelsea v Liverpool predicted line-ups + FPL team news appeared first on Best FPL Tips, Advice, Team News, Picks, and Statistics from Fantasy Football Scout.

arts.ttl: Liverpool very serious about signing 23-year-old Chelsea target with 16-G/A this season
arts.sum: Liverpool are interested in signing the Bayern Munich attacker Michael Olise at the end of the season. The French International has been outstanding since the move to Germany. The 23-year-old has already picked up eight goals and eight assists in 14 appearances across all competitions this season. arts.ttl: Liverpool star 'ruled out' of Chelsea clash; Reds could receive Ekitike boost
arts.sum: Liverpool are reportedly hopeful that Hugo Ekitike will be able to feature against Chelsea in the Premier League clash on Saturday, but Alisson Becker has been ruled out.
